forth_words

Summary
forth_words
Functions
STOP endless loop
SWAP ( x1 x2 -- x2 x1 )Exchange the top two data stack items.
DUP ( x -- x x )DUPlicate the top stack item.
OVER ( x1 x2 -- x1 x2 x1 )Make a copy of the second item on the stack.
ROT (n1 n2 n3 -- n2 n3 n1 )ROTate the positions of the top three stack items such that the current top of stack becomes the second item.
-ROT (x1 x2 x3 -- x3 x1 x2 )The reciprocal of ROT.
2DROP ( x1 x2 -- )Discard the top two data stack items.
2DUP ( x1 x2 -- x1 x2 x1 x2 )DUPlicate the top cell-pair on the data stack.
2SWAP (x1 x2 x3 x4 -- x3 x4 x1 x2 )Exchange the top two cell-pairs on the data stack.

Functions

STOP endless loop

SWAP ( x1 x2 -- x2 x1 )

Exchange the top two data stack items.

DUP ( x -- x x )

DUPlicate the top stack item.

OVER ( x1 x2 -- x1 x2 x1 )

Make a copy of the second item on the stack.

ROT (n1 n2 n3 -- n2 n3 n1 )

ROTate the positions of the top three stack items such that the current top of stack becomes the second item.

-ROT (x1 x2 x3 -- x3 x1 x2 )

The reciprocal of ROT.  Non ANS, but widely available.

2DROP ( x1 x2 -- )

Discard the top two data stack items.

2DUP ( x1 x2 -- x1 x2 x1 x2 )

DUPlicate the top cell-pair on the data stack.

2SWAP (x1 x2 x3 x4 -- x3 x4 x1 x2 )

Exchange the top two cell-pairs on the data stack.
